About Me

Let me tell you a few things...


Hello!

My name is Vlad and I'm a front-end developer with a passion for learning and creating.

I find happiness in being a better version of myself today than I was yesterday.

A quick learner with a thirst for knowledge. Enthusiastic and hard-working, I pride myself on my attention to detail.

Thru patience & persistence I have developed a diverse set of skills, ranging from design, to HTML + CSS + Javascript, all the way to Version Control/Git. I am well-informed on multiple Operating Systems including Windows, MacOS, and my personal favorite Linux.

I truly believe it is a blessing to be part of this industry for the simple fact that it is an ever-changing field. This means there is always something new to learn and that is exciting, at least for me.
